name: Stipend
description: Ways to find work, tasks, bounties, surveys or even offer them are split between multiple platforms and have astronomically high fees. We believe that a decentralized, blockchain-based platform will be better and a more future-proof replacement for such platforms. Because Stipend’s platform relies on the blockchain – all transactions, ratings and history will be permanently engraved into the blockchain which will further increase the openness and transparency in this market.
